definition: to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette

sentences.english: Layered with home-cooked mocha and lots of crunchy Californian walnuts.
sentences.chinese: 蛋糕中夹着一层层自制的摩卡和鲜脆的加州核桃。

sentences.english: Mocha coffee beans are one of the oldest known varieties of coffee in the world.
sentences.chinese: 摩卡咖啡豆是世界上已知的最古老的咖啡品种之一。

sentences.english: For me it's a peppermint mocha latte.
sentences.chinese: 对我来说那就是一杯薄荷飘香摩卡拿铁。

sentences.english: Flip open the lid of the upper pot, and light the stove.
sentences.chinese: 将摩卡壶的盖子打开，置于瓦斯炉上点火。

sentences.english: Please give me a large Mocha.
sentences.chinese: 请给我一个大号摩卡咖啡。

sentences.english: Mocha coffee was grown in Ethiopia of Africa.
sentences.chinese: 摩卡咖啡生长于非洲的埃塞俄比亚。

sentences.english: Again, it was OK. But I would have rather drank my Moka pot at home.
sentences.chinese: 再次说明，我还是想在家喝我用摩卡壶煮的咖啡。

sentences.english: Mocha coffee beans are rare and difficult to obtain.
sentences.chinese: 摩卡咖啡豆珍贵且不易获得。

definition: Baileys Irish Cream (brand of alcoholic drink)/see also 百利甜酒[Bai3 li4 Tian2 jiu3]

pinyin: Yi4 shi4 nong2 suo1 ka1 fei1
